recipe.name: Tortilla Pie
recipe.notes: I stood in fear of this recipe for some time, having horrible recollections about a dish involving tortillas and worrying that this one was perhaps it.  I've made it several times and under several conditions including make-ahead freezing and have not yet come up with a mystery method for fouling this thing up.  Delicious 70s goodness!The original recipe called for a "small can of niblets" which I like for sentimental reasons but we roll with big bags of frozen kernels at our house and that works fine too.
recipe.preparation: Brown hamburger and onion together in skillet.  Remove from heat and mix in chili powder, tomato sauce, and corn.  Season with salt and pepper to taste.Arrange a layer of tortillas on the bottom of casserole.  Put half of the sauce in a layer and top with chopped olives and grated cheese.  Repeat.Bake at 325F for 30 minutes.
